law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 145, sec. 8, effective June 16, 1972.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Grade separations - Relocation or vacation of existing highways - Rights of access - Regulations as to public utility facilities on or along turnpike projects.
